section.title: Diameter Support
section.para: The Diameter Base Protocol (RFC 3588) is a computer networking protocol for Authentication, Authorization, and Accounting (AAA). Diameter can be used as a stand-alone solution, or within the JAIN SLEE Server environment using Resource Adapters.
For more information regarding Diameter support, refer to the Diameter Home Page. For a list of Resource Adapter examples, refer to .
